strength_details: Established tech company (IBM) with global delivery centers
Focused on data governance with modern tools (Alation, Manta, Elasticsearch, Splunk)
Opportunity to work with diverse teams including scientists and engineers
concern_details: Role combines data engineering, governance, ML modeling, and search - high scope creep risk
Vague requirements with no experience level or career path specified
Onsite requirement in Pune with no work-life balance signals - potential for overtime
Limited growth signals with no explicit learning opportunities or promotion paths
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with experience in data governance tools (Alation, Manta)
Candidates seeking established company environment with focus on data governance
Professionals comfortable with onsite work in Pune, India
probe_details: Clarify the boundaries between data engineering, governance, and ML modeling responsibilities
Ask about typical work hours and client deadline pressures
Inquire about career progression opportunities within IBM Consulting
Understand the current state of tech debt and modernization plans
leverage_details: Expertise in Alation and Manta is a strong differentiator for this role
Experience with data lineage and governance in enterprise environments is valuable
summary.overall_assessment: Opportunity at established tech company IBM with focus on data governance and modern tools. Role has significant scope creep risk combining multiple disciplines, vague requirements, and potential for overtime in consulting environment. Best suited for mid-level engineers with governance expertise seeking stable company environment.
